editorialNotes.standard: If you can imagine it, you can create it—anything from monolithic towers to cavernous rollercoasters. That’s the idea that sparked a world-building phenomenon in Mojang’s amazing Minecraft. Since the game's release on the App Store, a steady stream of meaningful updates has kept this cube-filled universe fun, fresh and jam-packed with exciting features.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The infection has begun and it’s up to you to strategically spread and evolve a deadly plague to bring about the end of the human race. Saving the world and being a hero is honourable, but decimating the world with a deadly infection is a whole lot of fun — even though it shouldn’t be.

name: A Little to the Left: Drawers

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: It’s one thing to say you’d never take a bribe: It’s quite another when your options are taking one or missing rent or going hungry. That’s but a taste of the moral quandaries in Papers, Please, which puts you in the shoes of a border checkpoint agent in a fictional 1980s nation. Learning to master passport processing skills, avoiding fines, and making the most of your paycheck is uniquely satisfying and provocative in a way few games manage to achieve. This celebrated indie gem teaches us as much about empathy as it does time management.

ios.subtitle: Roll the Dice, Pass Go & Win

editorialNotes.short: Something's very wrong here. Can you get out alive?

advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: The moving story of a lifetime

editorialNotes.standard: Moving’s a drag! Relocate to this satisfying puzzler in which you unpack boxes filled with all sorts of goodies.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Team up to solve the puzzles

editorialNotes.standard: The concept behind Kingdom Rush Frontiers is exceptionally simple: take the same great ideas, visual style, and fiendishly difficult tower defense that millions fell in love with in the original game and improve it by adding tons of incredible content. Frontiers packs new heroes, settings, towers, and tons of fresh enemies to fend off, making the frenzied action even harder to put down.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Reimagining the decades-old blockbuster of the same name, Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse revamps Disney's love letter to classic platformers with a fantastic new design. Whether you have fond memories of the original or this is your first romp through the manic lands of the evil witch Mizrabel, Castle of Illusion epitomizes fantastic platforming. It’s an outstanding return for Disney’s most beloved mascot.

ios.subtitle: A story about love and life

editorialNotes.short: Game 7. An intimate and emotional love story.
editorialNotes.tagline: Game 7. An intimate and emotional love story.

editorialNotes.standard: Just from reading the title, you know your objective. But as you explore amazing paper-cutout landscapes, you’ll uncover a weird world dense with secrets and danger. Slick controls make traveling and harvesting food simple, but balancing your hunger and health—and sanity—requires crafting weapons, traps, machines and more. With tons of mysteries to uncover and challenges to complete, Don’t Starve will keep you enthralled.
This acclaimed platformer motivates you to to brush off mistakes and charge back into battle again and again.

Badland is an eerie sidescroller in which you guide a nondescript creature through creepy and perilous environments. Thanks to simple controls and obvious objectives, the game is instantly accessible, but winding levels and unique power-ups make each stage an exercise in careful timing and hasty strategies. As the gameplay evolves and becomes increasingly bizarre, Badland remains incredibly fun.

name: A Little to the Left: Stars

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: The realm is yours to rule

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Put a little “boo” in your botany by concocting herbal remedies for odd supernatural ailments in this eerie puzzle-adventure.
Cool reaction emoji! Strategy-smashing Nope cards! The fur truly flies in this slick adaptation of the zany card game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Start and get a survival kit!

editorialNotes.standard: After a long day at work, it’s bath time! But Swampy’s shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.

What’s made OLO game one of our longtime multiplayer favourites? The way it perfectly captures the friendly fun of real-world shuffleboard and air hockey. Virtually anyone can jump into a match (locally or online) and have an amazing time flicking discs into the target zone for points—and slyly knocking an opponent’s discs away to lower their score. Elegant and irresistible, Sennep’s all-ages masterpiece lets up to four players enjoy games that can be as casual or hardcore as everyone wants them to be.

ios.subtitle: Race the golden era of rally

editorialNotes.tagline: It’s a golden age for rallying
From the creator of Plague Inc.

editorialNotes.standard: If you’re going to wage Total War, you better have a total strategy. Feral’s faithful port takes us right back to the amazingly complex battles of Rome. We can’t help but make alliances, purposely break them, then chase down our newfound enemies. It’s all fun and games, right? That is, until they get the upper hand…

editorialNotes.tagline: Don't let the zombies stop you

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Smartly positioning fighters in this roguelike deckbuilder helps the gameplay shine as brightly as the flame you’re tasked with defending.
